abilities.description:
End your turn. On your next turn, your ranged abilities deal double damage.
[s:.7](Castable only if you haven't taken any other actions this turn.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
End your turn. On your next turn, your ranged abilities deal double damage.
[s:.7](Costs 0 mana. Castable only if you haven't taken any other actions this turn other than your movement action.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
End your turn. On your next turn, your ranged abilities deal double damage.
[s:.7](Castable only if you haven't taken any other actions this turn.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
结束你的回合。在你的下一回合，
你的远程技能造成双倍伤害。
[s:.7](仅限本回合未进行
其他行动时施放。)[/s]

description2_texts.en:
End your turn. On your next turn, your ranged abilities deal double damage.
[s:.7](Costs 0 mana. Castable only if you haven't taken any other actions this turn other than your movement action.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
结束你的回合。在你的下一回合，
你的远程技能造成双倍伤害。
[s:.7](消耗 0 法力值。
仅限本回合除移动行动外
未进行其他行动时施放。)[/s]

description_texts.en: Teleport to the last tile you targeted with an ability if it's empty.
description_texts.zh:
传送至你上一次使用技能
选定的地块（如果该地块为空）。

description2_texts.en: Teleport to the last tile you targeted with an ability. Displace and damage any units on that tile.
description2_texts.zh:
传送至你上一次使用技能
选定的地块。置换并伤害
该地块上的任何单位。

abilities.target_text:
target {
  target_mode random_tile
  range_mode last_targeted_tile
  min_range 1
  max_range 20
  aoe_mode occupied_tiles
  min_aoe 0
  max_aoe 0
  range_display_include_character_size true
  restrictions must_be_moveable
}

  restrictions [aoe_must_be_force_displaceable]
}

abilities.description: Dash up to three tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.
abilities.description_2: Dash up to five tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.

description_texts.en: Dash up to three tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.
description_texts.zh:
沿直线或对角线
冲刺最多 3 格。
在经过的地块上
留下浮空玻璃碎片。

description2_texts.en: Dash up to five tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.
description2_texts.zh:
沿直线或对角线
冲刺最多 5 格。
在经过的地块上
留下浮空玻璃碎片。

description_texts.en: Toss a unit to an empty tile within 3 tiles of you, then your allies attack it if they can.
description_texts.zh:
将一个单位投掷到
你周围 3 个地块内的
空地块上，然后你的
盟友会尽可能攻击它。

description2_texts.en: Toss a unit to an empty tile within 6 tiles of you and inflict Bruise, then your allies attack it if they can.
description2_texts.zh:
将一个单位投掷到
你周围 6 个地块内的
空地块上并施加淤伤，
然后你的盟友会尽可能攻击它。

abilities.target_text:
target {
  target_mode tile
  min_range 1
  max_range 3
  min_aoe 0
  max_aoe 0
  knockback_mode character_to_target
  restrictions must_be_empty
}
abilities.target_text_upgraded:
target {
  target_mode tile
  min_range 1
  max_range 6
  min_aoe 0
  max_aoe 0
  knockback_mode character_to_target
  restrictions must_be_empty
}

abilities.description: All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random nearby tiles and take damage when they land.
abilities.description_2:
All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random tiles and take damage when they land.
Bonus Passive: All of your spells have Earth element.

description_texts.en: All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random nearby tiles and take damage when they land.
description_texts.zh:
所有位于泥土地块上的
单位会被投掷到附近的随机地块上，
并在落地时受到伤害。

description2_texts.en:
All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random tiles and take damage when they land.
Bonus Passive: All of your spells have Earth element.
description2_texts.zh:
所有位于泥土地块上的
单位会被投掷到随机地块上，
并在落地时受到伤害。
奖励被动：你所有的
法术都具有土元素。

abilities.target_text:
target {
  target_mode none
  min_range 0
  max_range 4
  min_aoe 0
  max_aoe 1
  knockback_mode target_to_tile
  aoe_mode all
  aoe_restrictions [tile_must_have_element]
  aoe_tile_requires_element Earth
}
abilities.target_text_upgraded:

  max_aoe 1

  aoe_tile_requires_element Earth
}

abilities.description: Gain +99 Brace until your next turn, then disable this spell until you take a total of 25 damage.
abilities.description_2: Gain +99 Brace until your next turn, then disable this spell until you take a total of 15 damage.

description_texts.en: Gain +99 Brace until your next turn, then disable this spell until you take a total of 25 damage.
description_texts.zh:
获得 +99 护甲直到
你的下一回合，
并在你累计受到 
25 点伤害之前禁用此法术。

description2_texts.en: Gain +99 Brace until your next turn, then disable this spell until you take a total of 15 damage.
description2_texts.zh:
获得 +99 护甲直到

abilities.description: Fling all units in a straight line onto nearby tiles.
abilities.description_2: Fling all units in a straight line onto nearby tiles, dealing more damage.

description_texts.en: Fling all units in a straight line onto nearby tiles.
description_texts.zh:
将一条直线上的所有单位
抛到附近的地块上。

description2_texts.en: Fling all units in a straight line onto nearby tiles, dealing more damage.
description2_texts.zh:
将一条直线上的所有单位
抛到附近的地块上，
造成更多伤害。

abilities.description: Turn a tile into a dirt tile, smashing any inanimate objects into rocks.
abilities.description_2: Turn 3 tiles into dirt tiles, smashing any inanimate objects into rocks.

description_texts.en: Turn a tile into a dirt tile, smashing any inanimate objects into rocks.
description_texts.zh:
将一个地块变为泥土地块，
将任何无生命物体粉碎为岩石。

description2_texts.en: Turn 3 tiles into dirt tiles, smashing any inanimate objects into rocks.
description2_texts.zh:

将任何无生命物体粉碎为岩石。

abilities.description:
Get flung to a tile and deal damage to anything you land on.
This doesn't use up your movement action.
abilities.description_2:
Get flung to a tile and deal damage to anything you land on.
This doesn't use up your movement action.

Get flung to a tile and deal damage to anything you land on.
This doesn't use up your movement action.
description_texts.zh:
将自己抛向一个地块，
并对你落点上的
任何物体造成伤害。
这不会消耗你的移动行动。

description2_texts.en:

abilities.description: Trample over 2 tiles in a straight line destroying any inanimate objects.
abilities.description_2: Trample over 4 tiles in a straight line destroying any inanimate objects and inflicting Bruise 1 on units you trample.

description_texts.zh:
沿直线践踏穿过 2 个地块，
摧毁任何无生命物体。

沿直线践踏穿过 4 个地块，
摧毁任何无生命物体，
并对你践踏的单位施加 1 层淤伤。

abilities.description:
Start a sandstorm.
(Sandstorm deals 1 damage to all units at the end of round.)
If a sandstorm was already active, increase its damage by 1.
abilities.description_2:
Start a sandstorm.
(Sandstorm deals 1 damage to all units at the end of round.)
If a sandstorm was already active, increase its damage by 1.
[s:.7](This spell costs 0 mana the first time you cast it each turn.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Start a sandstorm.
(Sandstorm deals 1 damage to all units at the end of round.)
If a sandstorm was already active, increase its damage by 1.
description_texts.zh:
引发沙尘暴。
（沙尘暴在回合结束时对所有单
位造成 1 点伤害。）
如果沙尘暴已经生效，
则使其伤害增加 1 点。

description2_texts.en:
Start a sandstorm.
(Sandstorm deals 1 damage to all units at the end of round.)
If a sandstorm was already active, increase its damage by 1.
[s:.7](This spell costs 0 mana the first time you cast it each turn.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
引发沙尘暴。
（沙尘暴在回合结束时对所有
单位造成 1 点伤害。）
如果沙尘暴已经生效，
则使其伤害增加 1 点。
[s:.7](每回合首次施放此法术
消耗 0 法力值。)[/s]
